thread.title: Feel the Wind in Your Feet With the adidas Pure Boost Clima Shoe
thread.title_full: Feel the Wind in Your Feet With the adidas Pure Boost Clima Shoe

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Feel the Wind in Your Feet With the adidas Pure Boost Clima Shoe
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Brand : adidas
Model : Pure Boost Clima Shoe
Key Features : Blending proprietary Climacool and Boost technology, the sneaker is purpose-built for wearing on hot summer days. Notably, a “Stretchweb” rubber outsole extends into the medial of the shoe for support and ease of movement on any surface.
Release Date : Available now
Price : $140
Availability : adidas 
Editor’s Notes : Yet another knockout lifestyle runner from the Three Stripes, these beasts are the nearest you’ll get to wearing no shoes at all. In unisex sizes, the sneaker comes optioned in tasty tan, red, blue and white colorways.
For something slightly more robust, check out the adidas Pure Boost Xpose Clima Shoe .
